とみて星: (とみてぼし) - Chinese "Emptiness" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
とも: (とも) - certainly/of course/to be sure/surely; (usu. with vol. verb or adj. stem) even if/no matter (who, what, when, where, why, how)/though/although; (with neg. verb) without even/without so much as; (after an adverb)  at the (least, earliest, etc.); also (called); (sometimes esp. an emphatic form of the particle と)  emphatic particle
ともあろうもの: (ともあろうもの) - of all people (expression showing surprise at a high standing person's misbehavior)
ともすると: (tomosuruto) - propenso a, sujeito a, inclinado a
ともすれば: (tomosureba) - propenso a, sujeito a, inclinado a
ともばら: (トモバラ) - cut of meat comprising the plate and the flank
ともろく: (ともろく) - (from ともだちとうろく) Internet friend or buddy list
ともバラ: (トモバラ) - cut of meat comprising the plate and the flank
とも星: (ともぼし) - {astron}  Chinese "root" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
とも無く: (ともなく) - phrase used to express the uncertainty or lack of intent in what precedes it
とも無しに: (ともなしに) - to do something without any particular intention or mind to do so
とやかく言う: (とやかくいう) - to say all kinds of things; to complain; to find fault (with)
とやら: (とやら) - indicates uncertainty or second hand nature of information quoted
とらの子: (とらのこ) - tiger cub; treasure (as it is said that tigers treasure their young)
とらわれた考え: (とらわれたかんがえ) - prejudiced opinion; conventional ideas
とりこし苦労: (とりこしぐろう) - overanxiety; needless worry
とりの日: (とりのひ) - Bird Day; Day of the Bird
とりま: (とりま) - (abbrev. of とりあえず、まあ)  anyhow; for now
とりむね肉: (とりむねにく) - chicken breast meat
とり出す: (とりだす) - to take out/to produce/to pick out; to fetch/to retrieve
とり囲む: (とりかこむ) - to surround; to crowd around
とり戻す: (とりもどす) - to take back; to regain; to get back; to recover
とり払う: (とりはらう) - to clear away; to remove; to demolish
とり結ぶ: (とりむすぶ) - to make (a promise)/to conclude (a contract); to act as a go-between/to act as mediator; (usu. as ご機嫌を取り結ぶ) to curry favour with
とり貝: (トリガイ) - Japanese egg cockle (Fulvia mutica)
とり除く: (とりのぞく) - to remove; to deinstall; to take away; to set apart
とる: (とる) - (equiv. of -ている indicating continuing action as a verb ending; poss. contraction of -て ending + おる auxiliary verb) is being
とるに足りない: (とるにたりない) - of little importance; trivial; worthless; valueless
とるべき道: (とるべきみち) - course of action
とろ: (トロ) - fatty tuna meat (esp. belly, an expensive cut); fatty .../fatty cut of meat
とろき星: (とろきぼし) - Chinese "Turtle Beak" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
とろけるチーズ: (とろけるチーズ) - cheesing for melting; melting cheese
とろっと: (トロッと) - to become syrupy/to become thick (e.g. when cooking); stickily
とろとろ: (torotoro) - sticky, syrupy, pulpy; weakly (of a flame), gently (por exemplo, ferver), simmering; dozing off, napping; sluggishly, dawdling
とろみ: (とろみ) - thickness (e.g. of a sauce, oil, etc.); viscosity
とろろ昆布: (とろろこぶ) - shredded kombu; Kjellmaniella gyrata (species of kelp)
とろん: (とろん) - appearing drowsy or intoxicated (of eyes, actions, etc.)
とんちゃん: (トンチャン) - cows' or pigs' offal (entrails) (kor: ttongjang)
とんでも: (とんでも) - unthinkable; unexpected; outrageous; offensive
とんでもありません: (とんでもございません) - unthinkable/unexpected/outrageous/offensive; absolutely not!/not at all!/far from it!/impossible!/preposterous!/what a thing to say!/no way!/bullshit; don't mention it/you're welcome
とんでもございません: (とんでもございません) - unthinkable/unexpected/outrageous/offensive; absolutely not!/not at all!/far from it!/impossible!/preposterous!/what a thing to say!/no way!/bullshit; don't mention it/you're welcome
とんでもハップン: (とんでもハップン) - (ハップン is from "happen")  it'll never happen
とんでも無い: (とんでもない) - unthinkable/unexpected/outrageous/offensive/terrible; absolutely not!/not at all!/far from it!/impossible!/preposterous!/what a thing to say!/no way!/bullshit; don't mention it/you're welcome
とんとん: (tonton) - com um toque, com uma batida, com um som de batida, com um rap-tap; suavemente (prosseguir), sem problemas, sem demora; uniforme, igual, ponto de equilíbrio
とんとん拍子: (とんとんびょうし) - without a hitch; swimmingly; with rapid strides
とんど: (とんど) - burning of New Year's gate decorations (usu. on the 15th day of the New Year)
とんぶり: (とんぶり) - belvedere fruit; field caviar; land caviar; mountain caviar; kochia seed
とんぼ返り: (とんぼがえり) - somersault; returning from a destination right after arriving there/non-stop round trip/round trip without an overnight stop; abrupt change of direction
と仮定して: (とかていして) - assuming that ...; supposing that ...
と仮定しても: (とかていしても) - even assuming that ...; even granted that ...
と共に: (とともに) - together with; as X, then Y (e.g. as we age we gain wisdom, as wine matures it becomes more valuable, etc.)
と同じように: (とおなじように) - in the same way as; just like
と同じ様に: (とおなじように) - in the same way as; just like
と同時に: (とどうじに) - at the same time as; while; as well as (multiple roles)
と思しい: (とおぼしい) - thought to be; seen as
と思ったら: (とおもったら) - (after past tense verb)  no sooner than/as soon as/immediately after; at the thought of/when I think about
と思われる: (とおもわれる) - be considered; be deemed; thought to be
と書いてある: (とかいてある) - according to; reads; reading; is written; says; states
と来たら: (ときたら) - when it comes to ...; concerning; where ... are concerned
と考えられる: (とかんがえられる) - one can think that ...; it is conceivable that ...
と見られる: (とみられる) - (followed by verb) believed to; expected to; feared to; poised to; considered to; likely to
と覚しい: (とおぼしい) - thought to be; seen as
と言う: (とゆう) - called/named; (after a quantity) as many as/as much as; (in the pattern ＸというＸ) all X/every X
と言うか: (というか) - or perhaps I should say; or more precisely; or, how should I put it; or rather
と言うことだ: (ということだ) - (indicates hearsay) I've heard that .../rumour has it that ...; (expresses conjecture about another person's feelings or mindset) it appears as if ...
と言うことは: (ということは) - that is to say; so that means
と言うことはない: (ということはない) - it is not possible (to, that); there is no such thing as
と言うと: (というと) - if one were to speak of ..., then certainly/if it were the case that ..., then certainly/if it were a ..., then certainly/phrase used to indicate the inevitability of what follows it (based on what precedes it); so that means (when used in sentence-initial position)
と言うところ: (とゆうところ) - a state called/a position described as/can sum up as/approximates to; places known as/that called; the place named
と言うのに: (というのに) - even though; despite; when
と言うのは: (というのは) - means/is; (often as というのは...から) because/that is to say
と言うもの: (というもの) - something like ...; something called ...
と言う所: (とゆうところ) - a state called/a position described as/can sum up as/approximates to; places known as/that called; the place named
と言う物: (というもの) - something like ...; something called ...
